title: Man's hat
medium:
Medium: silk, silver metallic foil wound onto white silk
Technique: lampas (two interconnected structures of 4+1 satin (green) and plain weave (white); surface satin stitch
description: Silk men's cap with a rounded crown and turned-up brim. The fabric is a green silk satin ground with a woven pattern of flowers and arabesques in cream silk. The brim uses a different section of the same material, patterned with rabbits, fruit, trees, and addorsed birds.  Touches of salmon and silver embroidery accent both areas.
name: Man's hat
